dataList.content: 【To Faust】
【Consume your vocal cords, boiled for 14 seconds in simmering salt water, as part of your dinnertime meal】

dataList.title: The Index Messenger
dataList.content: Will you be all right?

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: It is the Will of the Prescript. I merely ensure that it is fulfilled.

dataList.title: The Index Messenger
dataList.content: ... There seem to be more Prescripts of this sort lately.

dataList.title: The Index Messenger
dataList.content: Last time, a Proselyte received a Prescript telling them to grill their own head medium-rare and serve it to their neighbor...

dataList.title: The Index Messenger
dataList.content: Does that not make you... scared?

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: The Prescript knows it all.

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: And consequently, Faust, who submits to the Prescript, is equivalent to knowing it all.

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: As such, there can be no place for fear.
【To Faust】
【Access the Gesellschaft and convert three unknown things into known things】

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: Once again, they refused to engage me, saying that there is nothing to discuss with a blindfolded Faust.

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: And yet, their inability to lower my access right or revoke it completely... must owe to the fact that I am a Faust who follows the Prescript.

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: So be it. So long as information remains available, the Prescript's execution will proceed unhindered.

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: "The Index's Fabric... is woven by looms..."

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: Hmm... fabrics are, obviously, made by machines such as looms.

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: If such mundane knowledge was recorded... then it is highly possible that the "looms" mentioned must conceal an alternate meaning.

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: ... But just in case, I will set aside this particular piece of information and select another three.
【To Faust】
【Within 1 week, rendezvous with other Proselytes at the intersection at Block B and walk the streets】
【Postscript: Walk by following the Proselyte who arrives last】

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: The texture of the slip is different.

dataList.title: The Index Messenger
dataList.content: It was given to me by a Messenger of another District.

dataList.title: The Index Messenger
dataList.content: Wait... The Prescript you received yesterday—didn't it tell you to eat your...

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: It is rather outdated to think that one cannot vocalize without vocal cords.

dataList.title: The Index Messenger
dataList.content: A-apologies.

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: That wasn't meant as a demand for apology, but... very well.

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: Hmm... I think I now understand how to carry out this Prescript.

dataList.title: The Index Messenger
dataList.content: Really? But it seemed... quite cryptic...

dataList.title: The Index Messenger
dataList.content: How do you plan to execute it?

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: ... I'll tell you when we meet again.
【To Faust】
【Climb to the rooftop of a building 3 stories or higher and wave your hand while looking down for 1 minute】

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: A simple enough Prescript. And that is...?

dataList.title: The Index Messenger
dataList.content: I received a Prescript telling me to deliver extra fabric to you.

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: ... It has been a while since I last received more fabric for patching.

dataList.title: The Index Messenger
dataList.content: Congratulations. If you receive it just once more, you might be able to lengthen your cloak.

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: Perhaps.

dataList.title: The Index Messenger
dataList.content: By the way, how did you carry out the Prescript from last time?

dataList.title: The Index Messenger
dataList.content: You said you'd tell me when we met again.

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: ... For an entire week, I kept walking around the intersection at Block B.

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: I walked in a wide loop with neither a start nor finish. In that way, I was able to fulfill the Prescript even when new Proselytes joined the group.

dataList.title: The Index Messenger
dataList.content: The way you're progressing, the Prescript may grant you a sword of your own rather than mere fabric.

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: If that is where the Prescript leads me.

dataList.title: The Carnival
dataList.content: Got Prescript? Not much time. Need tailoring? Give fabric.

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: The Tailor has arrived. I must take my leave.
【To Faust】
【Enter as the third customer of the day to a restaurant that sells chickens, and leave last】
【Start a game of hide-and-seek with at least three people, then return home as the "it."】
【Read six books, then visit the District that appears in the last book read. No time limit】

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: This means...
【To Faust】
【Kill the liar within the alley within alleys】

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: It seems you haven't followed the Prescript for quite some time.

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: There is no other explanation as to why a Messenger's long cloak could be sliced through with such ease.

dataList.title: The Index Messenger
dataList.content: Gah...

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: The different texture of the paper slip. The instructions that have become too intuitive. The unlimited deadline—as though someone had intended to allow me some room for flexibility. It all seemed too convenient to be true.

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: It wasn't hard to deduce the liar's identity.

dataList.title: The Index Messenger
dataList.content: Ngh... W-wait!

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: ... With this, I will be able to "kill the liar."

dataList.title: The Index Messenger
dataList.content: I... I was only undertaking the Prescript myself!

dataList.title: The Index Messenger
dataList.content: I was told to make false Prescripts and distribute them to the Proselytes... h-here, look—

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: Interesting. That, however, doesn't seem to be the direction to which the Prescript intended to lead you.

dataList.title: The Index Messenger
dataList.content: ... What?

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: I mean to say that not following the Prescript could have been a way to serve its Will.

dataList.title: The Index Messenger
dataList.content: B-but... That makes no sense! That's not—

dataList.title: The Index Proselyte
dataList.content: A warning, perhaps, that one must not be so easily swayed by what is visible.
